message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Unfortunately, I don't have any additional information to share about it. It's up to you to decide whether to take the risk or not.
Since there's an 80% chance of the product being high quality and its value to me would be $1250000, which is greater than the cost of $1000000, I'll take the risk and buy it.
